title: CommerceLab Mens Tee
subtitle: For inspired shop builders
short_desc: The Men’s Classic Tee gives a rich and structured look to the classic t-shirt and works great for layered streetwear outfits. Thanks to its durable fabric, it maintains sharp lines along the edges and lasts a long time. Add your design, and surprise your customers with a trendy tee option.
long_desc:
• 100% cotton
  • Sport Grey is 90% cotton, 10% polyester
  • Fabric weight: 5.0–5.3 oz/yd² (170–180 g/m²)
  • Pre-shrunk jersey knit
  • Open-end yarn
  • Tubular construction
  • Taped neck and shoulders
  • Double seam at sleeves and bottom hem
  • Tear-away tag
  • Blank product sourced from Honduras, Nicaragua, Haiti, Dominican Republic, Bangladesh, and Mexico
